titles.title: 535 Teach Me To Pray Lord (nice easy)

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 v3 c1 v4

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Teach me to pray
Lord teach me to pray
This is my heart cry day unto day
I long to know
Thy will And Thy way
Teach me to pray
Lord teach me to pray

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Living in Thee Lord
And Thou in me
Constant abiding this is my plea
Grant me Thy power
Boundless and free
Power with men and power with Thee

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Power in prayer
Lord power in prayer
Here 'mid earth's sin
And sorrow and care
Men lost and dying
Souls in despair
O give me power
Power in prayer

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
My weakened will
Lord Thou canst renew
My sinful nature
Thou canst subdue
Fill me just now with power anew
Power to pray and power to do

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Teach me to pray
Lord teach me to pray
Thou art my Pattern day unto day
Thou art my Surety
Now and for aye
Teach me to pray
Lord teach me to pray
